seller_description: Panoxyl Maximum Strength acne foaming face Wash, contains 10% benzoyl peroxide. Maximum strength foaming wash. Effectively penetrates pores killing the bacteria that cause acne. Clears existing acne blemishes and prevents new blemishes from forming. The highest strength of benzoyl peroxide available without a prescription. Gently removes dirt and excess oil to cleanse and unclog pores. Makes it an excellent choice for the management of acne on the face, chest and back.
review: My bare face in the pic above. Never been so confident going out bare face in my life. I’m so inlove with this product! Been using this for 6 months now, and my skin feels so smooth, and I saw results in just a week of using it. No irritation and so easy to use! I’ve tried so many expensive products and this one is the best so far for me and super affordable. I highly recommend it!
Expected_output: The PanOxyl Maximum Strength Acne Foaming Wash, as described by the seller, includes 10% benzoyl peroxide, offering the highest strength available without a prescription. The product claims to effectively penetrate pores, eliminating bacteria that cause acne, clearing existing blemishes, and preventing new ones. It is marketed as a gentle yet powerful solution for acne management on the face, chest, and back, while also removing dirt and excess oil to unclog pores. The seller’s images showcase a well-packaged, professional product with its key features highlighted. The buyer's review reflects a highly positive experience, emphasizing dramatic improvements in their skin within just a week of use. They report smooth, irritation-free skin and express newfound confidence in going out bare-faced after six months of usage. The buyer also appreciates the affordability and effectiveness compared to other expensive products they have tried. The buyer's image aligns closely with the seller's, showing the same product in use, with no visible discrepancies. In conclusion, the buyer is highly satisfied, and the product meets or exceeds the promises outlined in the seller's description, with no faults identified on either side. The alignment between the seller’s claims and the buyer’s positive experience indicates that the product delivers as advertised. Here, the buyer agrees with the seller, making this a clear success case.
label: 1:Here buyer satisfied with seller
